Dear ${object.employee_id.name},

For the FY ${ctx['current_fiscal']}, kindly upload the softcopies of your investment documents which are mentioned in the declaration form in Tendrils V6 > IT Declaration > My Tax > My Declaration form latest by end of ${ctx['end_date']}.

    Note:

1. Those who have opted for the New Tax regime are not required to provide/upload any document proof.

2. You may have some investment which you will pay between ${ctx['between_days']}. For these cases, you may upload the proof of payment for last year (which you had paid in ${ctx['last_fy']}). These documentary proof will be considered on adhoc basis. Later, youâ€™ll be allowed to upload the actual proof of current year payment by ${ctx['fy_last_day']}.

Based on the documents uploaded by you, the TDS calculation will be made during the next payroll cycle.
Please feel free to contact Finance Department in case you have any queries regarding uploading of documents.



Thanks,
Finance Department
